title: Benidorm star Julie Graham marries toyboy lover Davy Croket
text:
Julie Graham and Davy Croket have married (Picture: Wenn)

Benidorm star Julie Graham has wed her toyboy lover Davy Croket, four years after her husband tragically passed away.

Julie, 54, plays Sheron Dawson in the ITV comedy and tied the knot on Friday to Davy, a 38-year-old Belgian skydiving instructor.

The pair wed in Lewes, Sussex with Julie wearing a black print dress and a big smile on her face, while Davy wore a dark blue velvet blazer and jeans.

‘She said hell yeah,’ Davy captioned a snap of their big day while friend Sally-Anne Cooper added: ‘So this happened yesterday.

‘I was so happy to watch my darling @juliegraham marry the very special @croketdavy surrounded by their nearest and dearest.’

‘He’s just lovely, gorgeous and he makes me happy,’ Julie told The Sun of Davy after they met while she was filming the ITV show.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Meeting somebody was the last thing I wanted to do. I was adamant that I wanted to spend some time on my own.’

‘Although the year was very difficult in some ways, it has been really positive too,’ she added.

‘I got an amazing job in Benidorm.’

Julie was left heartbroken in 2015 when her husband Joseph died by suicide.

Joseph was also an actor and was found in Richmond Park, South West London.

A spokesman for the Metropolitan Police said: ‘A man in his mid-40s was pronounced dead at the scene. A report has been submitted to the coroner’s officer.’

He had appeared in the film Howards End and TV shows including The Bill and The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles.

description: Benidorm actress Julie Graham weds boyfriend four years after husband's death.
